comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

when opening the address book, the first card is displayed three times (	chronological not spatial).


Actual results:

############################################################################
# stack trace #1:

onselect([object Event])@chrome://messenger/content/addressbook/addressbook.xul:1

SelectFirstAddressBook()@chrome://messenger/content/addressbook/abCommon.js:422

delayedOnLoadAddressBook(81)@chrome://messenger/content/addressbook/addressbook.js:156

SelectFirstAddressBook()@chrome://messenger/content/addressbook/abCommon.js:422
